meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed a fabricated story before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: The fabricated painting looked so real that it fooled everyone.
meanings.sent3: The fabricated excuse for not doing homework was quickly exposed.
meanings.sent4: Her fabricated smile hid the sadness in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The fabricated world in the movie was full of magic and wonder.

meanings.sent1: The fabricated evidence led to an innocent person being accused.
meanings.sent2: She knew the rumors about her were all fabricated lies.
meanings.sent3: His fabricated alibi fell apart under scrutiny.
meanings.sent4: The fabricated story spread like wildfire through the town.
meanings.sent5: The fabricated news article caused a lot of confusion among readers.

meanings.sent1: The fabricated metal structure stood strong against the wind.
meanings.sent2: The company specialized in fabricated steel products.
meanings.sent3: The fabricated car parts were of low quality.
meanings.sent4: The fabricated building materials were delivered to the construction site.
meanings.sent5: The fabricated furniture was stylish and modern.
